article: Once upon a time there was an old general .He liked to drink wine better than anything else. He always  _  several bottles of good wine in his house. He  had to  go out one day, but he was  _  his servant would drink his wine. Then he thought of a way to  _  him doing so. "I'm going out for the day ." he  _  his servant. "Please  take care of  the house for me.There are some meat and two bottles of  _  in the kitchen .There is also a hen there.But be careful not to  _  it because it is poisonous.  _  you drink it ,it will kill you." But as soon as he left, his servant killed the hen and  _  it for dinner. He then ate  _  the hen and the meat, drank the two bottles of wine and went to bed. The general returned home late that evening.He was  _  to find that the hen, the meat and the two bottles of wine were gone. He then saw his servant  _  asleep in bed. There were two empty bottles beside him.He woke the servant up. "What was happened?" he asked. "I'm very sorry. "His servant replied." After you  _  ,a cat jumped in  _  the window and ate the meat. A dog took the hen away.I know you would be  _  with me when you returned,  _  I tried to  _  myself by drinking the poison .Please  _  me." The general didn't believe  _  he said but there was nothing he could do.
